name: Fight for Eden: HEAT
description:
Fight For Eden: HEAT is the a fantasy action-RPG VR game where you will follow the adult story of a young orc enrolled to fight against the half elves' oppression. Make friends or lovers, fight enemies, explore lands, all in an adult setting.

  • Romance: get to know Cynthia, the powerful half elf mage, who is helping the orcs against her brethren. Help her create powerful spells and potions by gathering specific ingredients, eventually becoming her lover in an uncensored setting.

  • Uncensored sex scenes.

  • Magic: learn how to cast magic spells. Use them to defeat your enemies.

  • Combat: Can use multiple melee weapons and shield. Think at strategies on how to approach multiple enemies, overcome their abilities and guide your team to achieve victory.

  • Weapons: multiple weapons with different attributes unlocked as the story progresses.

  • Story: Explore the history of Asquebesc region, speak with charismatic characters to find untold secrets about their lives and relationships.

  • VR Skills: Specific actions done by the player in real life translated as impressive skills in the virtual world. Twist of faith, twist of death, earth shaker.
